about_the_game:
Nightsky Blue Magical Girl is a role-playing mini game.
The player will play the role of Wong YukChan, a female high school student studying in Shenzhen. One day, by a stroke of luck, Wong YukChan lifted the female demon that had been sealed a thousand years ago and awakened her magic, using some simple magic.
The unsealed female demon is split into several monsters, which parasitize humans with poor mental states and worsen the host's mental state. Players need to investigate the whereabouts of monsters and defeat them while rescuing those who have been parasitized.
In the game, you need to consider your school's academic performance while trying to defeat monsters. Meanwhile, in this city, you will establish connections with others.

[From the production team]
This is our fourth work.
At the beginning of the establishment of YauYuenTong (GouLauTong), we were very eager to produce this work.
Unfortunately, due to a lack of technology, funding, and experience, we were unable to directly manufacture this work.
"Can we really present this work well?" Even with such lack of confidence, we decided to challenge ourselves and start the production of "Magical Girl in the Night Sky" because we really wanted to see the characters in the game soon.
Indeed, based on our current technology, funds, experience, and time, creating such a role-playing game may still be a bit rushed for us, but we have made efforts to play the cards in our hands as well as possible.
In order to create sustainably and sustainably for a long time, we are still striving to explore the path and way of life that suits us.
Your love is the greatest driving force behind our creativity. Therefore, I also hope that everyone can enjoy it.

[Game features]
Yuri
You can experience the life of a high school in Shenzhen to a certain extent by playing roles
Shenzhen citizens may feel a sense of closeness

short_description: You will play Wong YukChan, a high school student in Shenzhen. While enjoying campus life, you should investigate the monsters and seal them. In addition, you will act together with the cute girl Pak HoLing to defeat the monster, and develop a romantic relationship with her during this process.
